name: Green Planet Java, Inc.
description: Green Planet Java, Inc. is a leading company in the sustainable coffee industry, dedicated to producing high-quality, organic coffee while promoting environmentally friendly practices. Founded in 2010, the company has quickly established itself as a pioneer in the fair trade movement, sourcing its beans directly from small-scale farmers in various coffee-growing regions, including Central and South America. Green Planet Java emphasizes sustainability not only in its sourcing but also in its packaging, utilizing biodegradable materials to reduce environmental impact. The company offers a range of products including whole beans, ground coffee, and single-serve pods, all crafted to enhance the flavor profile while maintaining ethical practices. Green Planet Java is committed to transparency, ensuring that consumers know the origin of their coffee and the benefits provided to farmers. The company also engages in community development programs that support education and health initiatives for farmers and their families. With a mission to promote a healthier planet and foster fair trade, Green Planet Java continues to innovate in the coffee market, focusing on sustainability, quality, and social responsibility.

seo.meta_title: Green Planet Java, Inc. | Sustainable and Organic Coffee
seo.meta_description: Explore Green Planet Java, Inc., a leader in sustainable coffee production. Discover our commitment to quality, environmental responsibility, and fair trade practices.

faq.question: What is Green Planet Java known for?
faq.answer: Green Planet Java is known for its sustainable and organic coffee products sourced directly from small-scale farmers.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Green Planet Java?
faq.answer: Mary Thompson is the CEO of Green Planet Java, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Green Planet Java headquartered?
faq.answer: Green Planet Java is headquartered in Portland, Oregon, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Green Planet Java offer?
faq.answer: Green Planet Java offers whole beans, ground coffee, and single-serve pods.

faq.question: When was Green Planet Java founded?
faq.answer: Green Planet Java was founded in 2010.
